DataElement.preferredName: Person Diabetes Mellitus Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to a metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Diabetes Mellitus Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._A metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A human being.:A metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization.

Concepts.definition: A metabolic disorder characterized by abnormally high blood sugar levels due to diminished production of insulin or insulin resistance/desensitization.

Property.preferredDefinition: Elements of a personal medical history which are necessary to allow an individual to participate in a specific clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: If patient has diabetes, is i
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has diabetes, is it controlled?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have known pre-existing diabetes mellitus?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have uncontrolled Type I or II diabetes mellitus?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have uncontrolled Type I or II diabetes mellitus (DM) within 14 days prior to trial entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has history of known Type I or Type II diabetes, is the fasting glucose level less than 120 mg/dL on at least 2 separate occasions or HbA1c less than 8.5% at screening within 14 days prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has controlled Type 1 diabetes mellitus is the patient on a stable insulin regimen?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has diabetes, have they been on a stable dose of oral diabetes medication greater than or equal to 4 weeks prior to initiation of study treatment and laboratory eligibility criteria for fasting blood glucose (less than or equal to 150 mg/dL (8.3 mmol/L) and hemoglobin A1c (less than or equal to 7.5% (58 mmol/mol) are met?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: If patient has non-insulin dependent diabetes mellitus, is patient on a stable dose of oral diabetes medication greater than or equal to 4 weeks prior to initiation of study?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 9
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient have diabetes and is being treated with insulin?

DataElement.changeDescription: 2020-8-3 AQT added for P10398. AK 10/19/16 tt, released. 10/12/16 tt, 9767.
